data.description:
Vortex VR is an immersive investigation and an narrative experience : You explore the universe of the VORTEX series. Help the commissioner (played by Tomer Sisley) to solve the crime !

 As a Detective, you can inspect the crime scene: hurry up! You'll only have 20 minutes to collect all the clues and solve the crime before the tide covers the evidence.

Features: 
- Controlling time
 - Exploring and manipulating clues 
- Interactive narration 
- Actor Tomer Sisley in motion capture 

Only available in French

changelog.change_log:
We remove the support for Oculus Quest 1
Now, to keep  Vortex-VR support only the Oculus Quest 2 

This is a short narrative game only in French

The manifest included a permission to record audio :  we do not record sound. 

We do not use the mic in this build but in a later update we will use it for a mini-game : blowing on clue - using the mic sound to blow sand/blow vapor on a glass to reveal a fingerprint   .

Thank you

This version is only in French 
Ready for distribution 

Unity added in the manifest the following permissions restricted by Oculus : 
- android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO
- android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
- android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ SCAN
- android.permission.BLUETOOTH_CONNECT
- android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADVERTISE
There are not used .

The game is a single played narrative game without internet or bluetooth accessories.

Best regards
